item.title: Complete Guide to Lucky Draw Feature - Practical Guide from Configuration to Data Tracking, Easily Boost Event Participation
item.description: Lucky Draw is a professional lottery tool with core features including custom weight control, real-time data statistics dashboard, multi-scenario adaptability (live streaming, annual meetings, marketing, etc.), Excel batch import, and multi-language support, meeting cross-border event needs. Suitable for live streaming interaction, corporate events, marketing promotions, and other scenarios, operations cover creating activities, setting rules, starting lottery, and exporting results, enabling efficient and controllable lottery activities.
